Passive Compassion

There is nothing worse than passive compassion. Sometimes compassion means getting angry on behalf of someone else and taking a stand. If a bully is bullying others on the playground and you “feel bad” about the person being bullied, but choose to do nothing… …that is not compassion, you that is passivity.
